ygData.subject: Re: Enchanter Nerf Protest.
ygData.msgSnippet: ok I will submit to this Strike on May 22, but i dont really think that its gonna get thier attentions, i think we all need to decide a message to send
ygData.messageBody:
ok I will submit to this Strike on May 22, but i dont really think that its
gonna get thier attentions, i think we all need to decide a message to send
everyday as a /bug and maybe with enough of us sending this everyday we
might get thier attention, hopefully.
----- Original Message -----
From: Silverlock <croesus@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 5:25 AM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Enchanter Nerf Protest.


> From: Silverlock <croesus@...>
>
> Due to the continual Nerfing of the Enchanter class there has been a call
to
> have a day where no one plays thier Enchanter characters. This Enchanter
> boycott is tentatively scheduled for May 22cnd. If you are at all
concerned
> with the contunual degradation of the Enchanters spells especially the
bread
> and butter spells like Mez, Memory Blur, and Whirl please tell all your
> friends about thsi and pass it along. And don't play your Enchanter on May
> 22cnd. Maybe we can send a message to Verant that we are tired of losing
> abilties.
> --
> Silverlock, ICQ 474725
>
> Household Pests? The SW-404 'SpitFire' APRL cleansing system
> will remove them, we Guarantee IT! Not responsible for damage
> to persons or structures from use of this product.
> Dial 1-800-FRY-THEM for info and a home demonstration.
>
>
>
